Today, the South is quiet with a weak 3 ft @6s ESE swell, but fresh 19 mph ESE winds are making it messy. Tomorrow sees a slight drop to 2 ft @5s ESE, with moderate 15 mph NNE winds adding some chop. The day after continues the trend with similar conditions at 2 ft @5s ESE and fresh 21 mph E winds. Best: today.
